document.masterDocTitle: Systematic revision of the South American genus Praocis Eschscholtz, 1829 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae). Part 1: Introduction and subgenus Praocis s. str.

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographic distribution. Chile (Atacama Region: Huasco Province to Coquimbo Region: Limarí Province), in the Coquimbo biogeographic province.
